mooc-desc: Allows to create and maintain Massive Open Online Courses.
_mooc-comment-modal-button-title-<action: // Labels for action buttons in modal boxes.
// Info texts and links for empty sections.
mooc-section-learning-goals-empty-descri: There have been no learning goals set for this course yet.
mooc-section-learning-goals-empty-edit-l: Click here, to add learning goals.
mooc-section-video-empty-description: The course video has not been defined yet.
mooc-section-video-empty-edit-link: Click here, to define the video.
mooc-section-script-empty-description: The course script has not been created yet.
mooc-section-script-empty-edit-link: Click here, to create the script.
mooc-section-quiz-empty-description: The course quiz has not been created yet.
mooc-section-quiz-empty-edit-link: Click here, to create the quiz.
mooc-section-further-reading-empty-descr: The further reading resources to this course have not been set yet.
mooc-section-further-reading-empty-edit-: Click here, to add further reading resources.
mooc-section-lessons-empty-description: No lessons have been added to this course yet.
mooc-section-lessons-empty-edit-link: Use the button "Add Lesson" to add a lesson.
mooc-section-units-empty-description: No units have been added to this lesson yet.
mooc-section-units-empty-edit-link: Use the button "Add Unit" to add a unit.
